CLuaParticle/GetAirResistance.description: Returns the air resistance of the particle.

CLuaParticle/GetAngleVelocity.description: Returns the angular velocity of the particle

CLuaParticle/GetAngles.description: Returns the current orientation of the particle.

CLuaParticle/GetColor.description: Returns the color of the particle.

CLuaParticle/GetDieTime.description: Returns the amount of time in seconds after which the particle will be destroyed.

CLuaParticle/GetEndAlpha.description: Returns the alpha value that the particle will reach on its death.

CLuaParticle/GetEndLength.description: Returns the length that the particle will reach on its death.

CLuaParticle/GetEndSize.description: Returns the size that the particle will reach on its death.

CLuaParticle/GetGravity.description: Returns the gravity of the particle.

CLuaParticle/GetLifeTime.description: Returns the 'life time' of the particle, how long the particle existed since its creation.

CLuaParticle/GetPos.description: Returns the absolute position of the particle.

CLuaParticle/GetRoll.description: Returns the current rotation of the particle in radians, this should only be used for 2D particles.

CLuaParticle/GetRollDelta.description: Returns the current rotation speed of the particle in radians, this should only be used for 2D particles.

CLuaParticle/GetStartAlpha.description: Returns the alpha value which the particle has when it's created.

CLuaParticle/GetStartLength.description: Returns the length which the particle has when it's created.

CLuaParticle/GetStartSize.description: Returns the size which the particle has when it's created.

CLuaParticle/GetVelocity.description: Returns the current velocity of the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetAirResistance.description: Sets the air resistance of the the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetAngleVelocity.description: Sets the angular velocity of the the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetAngles.description: Sets the angles of the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetBounce.description: Sets the 'bounciness' of the the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetCollide.description: Sets the whether the particle should collide with the world or not.

CLuaParticle/SetCollideCallback.description: Sets the function that gets called whenever the particle collides with the world.

CLuaParticle/SetColor.description: Sets the color of the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetDieTime.description: Sets the time where the particle will be removed.

CLuaParticle/SetEndAlpha.description: Sets the alpha value of the particle that it will reach when it dies.

CLuaParticle/SetEndLength.description: Sets the length of the particle that it will reach when it dies.

CLuaParticle/SetEndSize.description: Sets the size of the particle that it will reach when it dies.

CLuaParticle/SetGravity.description: Sets the directional gravity aka. acceleration of the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetLifeTime.description: Sets the 'life time' of the particle, how long the particle existed since its creation.

CLuaParticle/SetLighting.description: Sets whether the particle should be lighted.

CLuaParticle/SetNextThink.description: Sets when the particles think function should be called next, this uses the synchronized server time returned by

CLuaParticle/SetPos.description: Sets the absolute position of the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetRoll.description: Sets the roll of the particle in radians. This should only be used for 2D particles.

CLuaParticle/SetRollDelta.description: Sets the rotation speed of the particle in radians. This should only be used for 2D particles.

CLuaParticle/SetStartAlpha.description: Sets the initial alpha value of the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetStartLength.description: Sets the initial length value of the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetStartSize.description: Sets the initial size value of the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetThinkFunction.description: Sets the think function of the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetVelocity.description: Sets the velocity of the particle.

CLuaParticle/SetVelocityScale.description: Scales the velocity based on the particle speed.
